General.Name: Airmate Cayman International Co Ltd
General.Description: Airmate (Cayman) International Co Limited engages in the research, design, development, production, and sale of household appliances in China, Japan, South Korea, and internationally. It offers electric fans, electric heaters, ventilators, induction cookers, electric kettles, and other series of household appliances; and dehumidifiers and air purifiers. The company also provides precision molds treatment services. It sells its products through online store. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in George Town, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: Cricket Square, George Town, Cayman Islands

4.Name: Ms. Yan  Lei
4.Title: Head of China Market Department, China Marketing Department & Gen. Director
